CustomField.description: Formula which returns the MPR type based on the related Pay Code, Project Code, or Timesheet Activity.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK(tc9_et__Primary_Minimum_Pay_Rate__c), ISBLANK(tc9_et__Allowance_Pay_Code__c) ), "Base", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(tc9_et__Allowance_Pay_Code__c)), "" + tc9_et__Allowance_Pay_Code__r.Name, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(tc9_et__Project_Code__c)), "Project Code: " + tc9_et__Project_Code__r.Name, "Variation: " + tc9_et__Timesheet_Activity__r.Name ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula which returns the MPR type based on the related Pay Code, Project Code, or Timesheet Activity.
CustomField.label: MPR Type
